title: How to Use Coursera

steps.headline: Enter "coursera.org" into your address bar and press enter.
Click on the Sign Up button in the upper-right-hand corner of their website.
Enter all the necessary information: your name, email, and password.
steps.description: Check the "I agree to the Terms of Service and Honor Code" box, and click the Sign Up button. You should get a welcome email shortly.

steps.headline: Use the search box on your dashboard.
steps.description: Type the course topic you're interested in, and check for results.

steps.headline: Read the "About the Course" section on the course page to get an overview of the course topic.
steps.description: Be sure to check the duration of the course and the weekly time requirements.

steps.headline: Click Join for Free
steps.description: If you want a Verified Certificate, click Earn a Verified Certificate (this is usually just below the "Join for Free" button). It will take you to a page that lists the price. Click the Join Signature Track for this course button and proceed from there.

steps.headline: Click the Go to Class button on the "Congratulations!"
Select an option on the "Please tell us your goals" section.
steps.description: Read the Honor Code, and then click I Agree.

steps.headline: Get started!
steps.description: You've now registered for a course. Just follow the instructions on the course pages and start your learning journey.
